result.title: Create Educational Content and Win
result.content:
Educational platform Stepik.org opens a content competition with the goal of creating personalizable (adaptive) online courses in Computer Science. Create 20+ programming or algorithmic problems on Stepik and win up to $10K!

More details about the competition at http://adaptive.stepik.org, also feel free to post questions in the comments below.

Help us move the CS education forward!

P.S. Competition deadline will be shifted from February to March, stay tuned.
